Amidst the serenity of everyday life and the chaos of the bizarre, these six individuals, along with their eccentric acquaintances, navigate through a world where the mundane and the absurd coexist. From school commutes and crow bites to friend gatherings and deer wrestling matches, the extraordinary everyday lives of Nichijou's inhabitants are far from ordinary.

In this peculiar town, the lives of three high school friends - Mio Naganohara, Yuuko Aioi, and Mai Minakami - collide with those of a child genius, Hakase Shinonome, her android caretaker Nano, and their chatty cat, Sakamoto. As they traverse through the ordinary and the outlandish, these six individuals, along with their quirky peers, experience the tranquility of daily routines and the madness of the preposterous. From walking to school and encountering talking crows to spending time with friends and witnessing the principal wrestle a deer, the extraordinary everyday lives of Nichijou's residents are anything but dull.
